name: Tryit Editor
summary: A free, open source, and easy to use HTML editor
short_description:
WEBS TOOK TRYIT EDITOR DOWN, TRYING TO REUPLOAD TRYIT EDITOR TO ANOTHER HOSTING SERVICE.

Tryit Editor is a lightweight HTML editor that uses CodeMirror to highlight code. It features an easy to use WYSIWYG interface, as well as many functions, such as saving to local disk. Features automatic updates of main script files.

Code is released under MIT license.

CodeMirror is copyright Marijn Haverbeke, and is released under a MIT-style license. Read the CodeMirror license at: http://codemirror.net/LICENSE

This is the official download and repository site for Tryit Editor, sites such as 4shared, famouswhy, and softpedia have outdated, modified, or broken versions of Tryit Editor. BE SAFE! DOWNLOAD ONLY FROM SOURCEFORGE!
